text: The following lists events that have happened in 1911 in the Qajar dynasty in Iran. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Ahmad Shah Qajar * Prime Minister: ** until March 12: Mostowfi ol-Mamalek ** March 12-July 26: Mohammad Vali Khan Tonekaboni ** starting July 26: Najaf-Qoli Khan Bakhtiari ==Events== * December 11 – Russian Invasion of Tabriz and two other northern cities of Iran begins. ==References== Iran Category:Years of the 20th century in Iran Category:1900s in Iran Iran
title: 1911 in Iran
